sentence.Network_en: The government is trying to replenish supplies by airlifting food.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府正试图通过空投食品补充供应。

sentence.Network_en: There is a concern about replenish-ment of the population.
sentence.Network_cn: 有人担心人口的补充问题。

sentence.Network_en: Three hundred thousand tons of cereals are needed to replenish stocks.
sentence.Network_cn: 需要30万吨谷类补充库存。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... replace 更换 replenish 补充 reply 答覆.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... deplenish v 倒空，弄空 replenish v 再装满 plen 满+.
overflow drain溢流口replenish加油refuel panel access door加油面板盖板
充实_百度百科 ... [enrich] 使内容丰富 [replenish] 使充足 [substantial] 内容充足不虚.

list.abs: 巧克力人... ... 快速反应战略 quick-response 连续补充战略 continuous replenishment 自动化补充战略 automatic replenishment.
replaceable blade utility knife 实用刀replenishment pump 补给泵replica of plane diffraction grating 平面衍射复制光栅.
快速补充（efficient replenishment）(Efficient Replenishment) 包括电子数据交换(EDI),以需求为导向的自动连续补充和计算机辅助订货,使补充系统的时间和成本 …
replenishment pump 补给泵replenishment ship 供应船replenishment ship 海上补给船

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'supply abundantly'): from Old French repleniss-, lengthened stem of replenir, from re- 'again' (also expressing intensive force) + plenir 'fill' (from Latin plenus 'full')

entry.def: If you replenish something, you make it full or complete again.

example.ex: Three hundred thousand tons of cereals are needed to replenish stocks...
example.tran: 需要30万吨谷类补充库存。

example.ex: The insurance fund will need to be replenished.
example.tran: 保险基金将需要进行补充。

means.word_mean: 1. fill something that had previously been emptied;

auth_sentence.content: Extra rainfall would replenish at leat some of them.
auth_sentence.res_content: Extra rainfall would replenish at leat some of them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Extra rainfall would replenish at leat some of them.

auth_sentence.content: We're consuming faster than the world can replenish.
auth_sentence.res_content: We're consuming faster than the world can replenish.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We're consuming faster than the world can replenish.

auth_sentence.content: We are draining aquifers far faster than they can replenish.
auth_sentence.res_content: We are draining aquifers far faster than they can replenish.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We are draining aquifers far faster than they can replenish.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无限的、绝对的,充分的, 完全的
stems_affixes.word_buile: plen满,填满+ary……的→adj.无限的、绝对的,充分的, 完全的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 许多的, 大量的, 丰富的, 丰饶的
stems_affixes.word_buile: plenty丰富+ful表形容词→plentiful许多的, 大量的
plenty[n.丰富,大量]+itude状态→plentitude满的状态→充分
de去掉+plen满,填满+ish表动词→去掉满→倒空
re再+plen满,填满+ish表动词→再弄满
